title: Prices so good i should be arrested for mail fraud--psa 5's/6's

posts.post_title: Prices so good i should be arrested for mail fraud--psa 5's/6's
posts.post_content:
Just got back from 6 Safaris in the bush at Londolozi Reserve, south africa and shark cage diving off Capetown...took my wife, my 2 children and ex-girlfriend of my son who I have always liked!! Now I am broke and need quick $$$....If anyone is thinking of a South African Safari ( not the kind of that  killer dentist Walter Palmer in Minnesota), I can certainly steer you in a good direction (Dan Koteles, you would have loved it..................................................................................................Scans available but can't get them out til later today---pp gift or ck pls
Prices  include shipping/ins.  Prefer emails to [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url] or 770 873 1181 cell phone.

T206 Fiene portrait PSA 6  SC 350 factory 25   $195.00

T206 McGlynn    PSA 6  Pied 350                     $190.00

T206 Fred Clarke  Portrait  PSA 5                     $395.00

T206 PSA 5'S  all $100.00 each   ....
    McQuillan with bat;  O'Leary Portrait;  Williams

ciao for now Bill Latzko

Great offerings...


Are you any kin to the former Florida Gator full back from the '06 national championship team (Billy Latzko)?

South Africa is great! I too went shark cage diving east of Capetown but was a bit dissappointed with the water clarity and of course it was mega cold! Wonderful country everyone should try to go see. Take care!
